ai-atk-s0513a11:2240_0: Herein, there are three kinds of bad conduct: by someone who is unethical and of bad conduct.
ai-atk-s0513a11:2240_1: He who rules as anointed aristocratic king or a renunciate of of robes, etc., that is, unfit for useful robes, etc., and offered usually because of the accomplishment in protection of robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick.
ai-atk-s0513a11:2240_2: He who attends on such an unethical person, associates with such an unethical person, accompanying, and attends on him.
ai-atk-s0513a11:2240_3: The bad act only as much as they arisee once unvirtuous fire, and bad-natured (?) was an unethical person.
ai-atk-s0513a11:2240_4: A wise disciple of the swamp
ai-atk-s0513a11:2240_5: So too, when the receiver is unsuitable.
ai-atk-s0513a11:2241_0: and having consecrated the Dhamma to the Bodhisatta’s verses, having done merit with them,
ai-atk-s0513a11:2242_0: The Teacher, having taught this Dhamma teaching, he related the Palace to the Friend.
ai-atk-s0513a11:2242_1: “A student who was dead and incompetent became a teacher of the highest offerings. He was the only one who had been distributed.”
ai-atk-s0513a11:2243_0: and in the appearance of the King Uppalavaṇṇā,
ai-atk-s0513a11:2246_0: a cowherd’s cattle, and the banner made of gold,
ai-atk-s0513a11:2249_0: * Endowed with virtue and practices, a family traditions,
ai-atk-s0513a11:2250_0: A woman desired the welfare of a lion, she gave birth to a young woman.
ai-atk-s0513a11:2251_0: One deceiving another’s leper, because of anger and deluded,
ai-atk-s0513a11:2252_0: Kaṇṭaka, whose body is full of logs,
ai-atk-s0513a11:2253_0: The Book of the Ones is finished.
ai-atk-s0513a11:2254_0: The first section for recitation is finished.
